column5: Our Canadian Toonie Tournament Series is Pike Fishing on Long Point this Sunday. OFNers are especially welcome! More info here Canadian Toonie Tounament Series Just remember to bring a Toonie and a smile.
Hey Roger, where in Long Point?  I'll have room in the boat for two people (any takers?)... I was going to go Saturday, maybe Sunday too!!! -Brian

It'll be great to see you Brian.  We're launching out of Old Cut Boat Livery. Our tournament is only Sunday morning.  Evidently there is a big tournament running on Saturday. There is more information on this page. Sunday's Conditions We launch at 6:00 (or anytime after) and have to be back at the launch by noon. Don't forget your Toonie!
I may be able to make it Sunday - I have no car though... (or boat) so if you are making an offer Brian - may take you up on it!
Mepps + Pike Tourney = Everybody else going for Second!!  It would be great to see you out Mepps.
I'd love to come!  I also have a shiney new lure I just made for any one kind enough to give me a lift!
Consider it an offer... I'll PM you.
I've got a twonie and a ride thanks to Slowpoke!
I have a Loonie, 3 Quarters, 2 Dimes and a Nickle... will you make an exception for me? Clive willl need someone to hold the net and take pictures for him. -Brian
Have a great day Roger, wish I could have joined you. Nice to see you at the "office" today.  John
John what time were you at Roger's office today??? I was there at noon and met  Herc and Patrick got some planer board line, Dave Mercer's DVD #3 I think that was it and left around 1.00 pm
